Sentencas: Combustion processed nano-sized Ce0.79Sm0.20Co0.01O2-delta (CSCoO) and Ce0.80Sm0.20O2-delta (CSO) were sintered at various temperatures, and mechanical properties and microstructures were characterized.
Titulo: Mechanical strengthening of Sm-doped CeO2 ceramics by 1 mol% cobalt oxide for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The results demonstrate that besides a lowering of sintering temperature to achieve sufficient densification, the doping of very minor amounts of CoO (1 mol%) to CSO significantly enhanced mechanical properties.
Titulo: Mechanical strengthening of Sm-doped CeO2 ceramics by 1 mol% cobalt oxide for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The CSCoo sintered at 1100 degrees C exhibits a biaxial flexural strength of 354 +/- 42 MPa which compared with 194 +/- 57 MPa for CSO with a similar relative density sintered at 1400 degrees C.
Titulo: Mechanical strengthening of Sm-doped CeO2 ceramics by 1 mol% cobalt oxide for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: This slight modification in chemical composition also resulted in a slight improvement in micro-hardness.
Titulo: Mechanical strengthening of Sm-doped CeO2 ceramics by 1 mol% cobalt oxide for solid oxide fuel cell application
Mechanical strengthening of Sm-doped CeO2 ceramics by 1 mol% cobalt oxide for solid oxide fuel cell application
Mechanical strengthening of Sm-doped CeO2 ceramics by 1 mol% cobalt oxide for solid oxide fuel cell application
